title: League of Legends Queue Accept Doesn't Pop Up
body: So ever since I factory resetted my windows laptop back to windows 8.1, I have not been able to see or receive any notifications when I get a queue pop. This causes them to automatically be declined because I was never able to click accept in the first place because it never showed up. I now have a 15 minute penalty for declining too many queues.. Is there any way to fix this? I will usually receive a message saying "Active Game not Found" also.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is not establishing a solid connection to the PvP.net servers, which are the ones that notify you of queues and sync your actions to the matchmaking servers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
